list.q: Which fishes do spawning in the early spring
Which fish can migrate?
Where do fishes have a heart?
opt: in the middle of the body
behind the gills, on the ventral side of the body

list.q: Do people under the age of 14 must receive a fisherman's card?
What is the minimum age for fishing without supervision of seniors?
Is it mandatory to keep the fisherman's card during the fishing?
Is it allowed to reduce the distance to nearest fisherman?
opt: yes, but only after his accordance

list.q: Is the fisherman obliged to free the fishing spot in case of competitions on it?
What should be done in case of catching wish with marker?
opt: send the mark to the nearest PZW office
send a few scales taken above the lateral line of the fish
send the information about type, weight, length and location

list.q: What types of fishing are prohibited?
opt: trolling method with a lot of baits
affect fish by sound, electromagnetic and other ways

list.q: How many hooks are allowed with fly-fishing method?
How many hooks are allowed when using spinning?
Is it allowed to use caviar or crayfish as a lure?
opt: depends on type of crayfish or caviar

list.q: Fisherman is prohibited to:
opt: keep the fish smaller than its protected size
to cut off heads and tails after the end of catching
to fish closer than 150 meters from weirs, sluices, dams

list.q: Which distance is incorrect when fishing near the weirs, sluices, dams:
Is it allowed to fish from bridges?
Is it allowed to keep the fish on fishing spot exceeding the daily quota?
Which type of fish should be killed immediately after being caught?
Is it allowed to use the fish that was caught in another reservoir as a bait?
How many fishing rods are allowed to use simultaneously?
What is the minimum distance to the nearest fisherman (fishing from the shore)?
What is the minimum distance to the nearest boat (fishing from the boat)?
What is the minimum distance to the nearest fisherman (fishing with spinning from the shore)?
What is the biggest acceptable diameter of holes in the ice? (winter fishing)
Which distance between the ice holes is allowed?
Is the night is fishing allowed?
opt: yes, if the ice thickness is more than 10 cm

list.q: What is the protected size for Asp and Barbel?
What is the protected size for Salmon, Whitefish, Brown trout?
What is the protected size for Lake trout, Pike, Zander?
What is the protected size for Catfish?
What kinds of crayfish are prohibited to catch?
Fisherman must pass on-demand inspection of:
How fish should be stored on the fishing spot?
opt: in soft thread stretched nets over a hoop

list.q: Is it alloed to use the artificial light to affect the fish?
opt: it is possible only on the rivers
it is possible only on the lakes

list.q: What is the protected period for Perch?
opt: from 1 of January to 30 of April
from 1 of March to 31 of July
from 1 of October to 31 of December

list.q: What is the protected period for Pike?
opt: from 1 of January to 30 of April
from 1 of March to 31 of July
from 1 of October to 31 of December

list.q: What is the protected period for Asp?
opt: from 1 of January to 30 of April
from 1 of March to 31 of July
from 1 of October to 31 of December

list.q: What is the protected period for Burbot?
opt: from 1 of January to 30 of April
from 1 of December until the end of February
from 1 of October to 31 of December

list.q: What is the protected period for Eel?
opt: from 15 of January to 15 of April
from 15 of October to 15 of December
from 15 of June to 15 of July

list.q: Is it always necessary to have a special device for removing the hook?
